description:
Want to know what driving an 18 Wheeler feels like? Truck Simulator USA Revolution offers a real trucking experience that will let you explore amazing locations. This American truck simulator features many American and European semi truck brands and all kinds of big rigs with realistic engine sounds and detailed interiors! Drive across America, transport cool trailers such as vehicles, gasoline, gravel, food, ship anchors, helicopters, and many more… Become a professional truck driver and enjoy the career mode! 

Drive your favorite American or Euro truck across the American continent, play Truck Simulator USA Revolution!

The ultimate truck simulator game you’ve been waiting for is here!

Features:
• Which 18 wheeler do you like most? Discover many new American and Euro truck brands.
• Drive your big rig truck across USA, Canada and Mexico
• New and improved graphics engine!
• Different climate locations: desert, snow, mountain, city.
• Improved Controls.
• Realistic Engine Sounds.
• Practice your truck parking skills and learn how to park your truck like a pro.
• Lots of heavy duty and regular trailers to transport.
• Career Mode.
• Buy a warehouse and be on your way to become a truck tycoon.
• Visual and mechanical damage on vehicles.
• New weather system (snow, rain, sun...).
• Discover new truck models such as a British lorry and prototype electric trucks.
name: Truck Simulator USA Revolution
